title: Area of triangle-quadratic and tangent part - b

content.description: Let f(x)=6−x2 . For <math> <mrow> <mn>0</mn> <mo><</mo> <mi>w</mi> <mo><</mo> <msqrt> <mn>6</mn> </msqrt> </mrow> </math>, let A(w) be the area of the triangle formed by the coordinate axes and the line tangent to the graph of f at the point(w,6−w2) .
content.question: For what value of w is <math> <mrow> <mi> A </mi> <mrow> <mo> ( </mo> <mi> w </mi> <mo> ) </mo> </mrow> </mrow> </math> a minimum?

frqParts.text: For what value of w is <math> <mrow> <mi> A </mi> <mrow> <mo> ( </mo> <mi> w </mi> <mo> ) </mo> </mrow> </mrow> </math> a minimum?

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
